content: **garland autumn 2024 is the result of the collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **size ** one size **measurements ** 195cm / 77¼ long x 60cm / 23½ wide **materials ** garland hobbii x pom pom 70% cotton 30% alpaca 105m / 114yd per 50 g shade caterpillar 7 balls **needles ** 4mm / us 6 knitting needles 4mm / us 6 circular needle 60cm / 24 length always use a needle size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **gauge ** 21 sts & 24 row = 10cm / 4 over lace pattern on 4mm us 6 needles after blocking **pattern information ** hiedra is worked flat beginning at one tip with increases every right-side row to the centre while working a pretty leaf and cable pattern decreases are then worked every right-side row to the other tip **find the pattern in more languages
